ceoSection.title:
Pioneering the Future
of Technology
ceoSection.name: Kohie Yoshida
ceoSection.quote: At Genesis, we believe technology is not just a tool — it is the bridge between ambition and impact. Our mission has always been to empower businesses across the globe with forward-thinking solutions that drive real, measurable transformation. From Japan to India to the UAE, we are building a network of innovation that transcends borders. Every partnership we forge, every project we deliver, is a step toward a more connected and resilient future. The world is evolving faster than ever, and we are proud to be at the forefront — pioneering what comes next.

tx001.headline: IDEATHON — Genesis x IIT Mandi
tx001.summary: Genesis Group is proud to announce IDEATHON, a flagship innovation challenge happening at IIT Mandi in April 2026. Bringing together top student minds and industry experts, the event will feature intensive problem-solving rounds, mentorship sessions, and hands-on workshops spanning AI, drone technology, and sustainable engineering. Participants will compete to build real-world solutions under the guidance of Genesis engineers and academic mentors. Stay tuned for registration details and more updates.
